mapper.sql: id as id, account_id as accountId, fans_account_id as fansAccountId, level as level, fans_image as fansImage, fans_nickname as fansNickname, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM `order` AS od, qqbs_fans AS hf WHERE od.account_id = hf.fans_account_id AND od.STATUS IN (2, 3, 4) AND hf.account_id = #{accountId}
SELECT sum(real_price) FROM `order` AS od, qqbs_fans AS hf WHERE od.account_id = hf.fans_account_id AND od.STATUS IN (2, 3, 4) AND hf.account_id = #{accountId}
